name: SyncStone
description: Export FINAL FANTASY XIV's "The Lodestone" diary to Markdown. Lodestone has no export function, so save your precious memories locally.

features.title: Complete Backup
features.description: Title, body, images, comments, likes, date, tags. Everything saved as Markdown and ZIP.

features.title: Bulk Export
features.description: Export all entries at once. Generates index.md with links to all articles.

features.title: 5 Regions
features.description: JP, NA, EU, FR, DE. Works on any Lodestone region.

features.title: Bulk Image Download
features.description: Downloads images from articles and image gallery. Saves to images/ folder without duplicates.

features.title: Other Players' Entries
features.description: Export friends' entries too. Save memories before they quit.

features.title: Server-friendly
features.description: Configurable access interval (default 2 seconds). Respectful to servers.
